DOC.brief_summary: For both induction of remission and in maintenance of remission, different doses and treatment durations are used in practice. The aim of this study is to assess how mesalazine is used in clinical practice, at which doses and for how long and how these differences impact the patient disease state and work productivity.
DOC.brief_title: Induction and Maintenance of Remission With Pentasa as Ulcerative Colitis Treatment
